name: October 10K Challenge

name: Nike Sydney Harbour Road to Running Royalty Challenge
description: Run 4 segments for your chance to unlock a ticket to Nike's panel event.

description: Run Every Woman’s Marathon with Team Milk—any pace, any place.

name: Think Turkey's Wishbone Challenge
description: Get active to give. Help provide holiday meals for those in need.

name: Wicked: For Good Challenge

name: Acorns: Grow Your Potential Challenge

task: Move 1 mile for 8 days over 4 weeks.
